segments.text: We've changed the schedule again . I really want to meet with you , Mr . White . I just need some time to sort out my schedule .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know you are pretty busy these days . But we have got to work fast on this . Otherwise , we'll lose the market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I realize that . We don't have anytime to waste . I can put you down for 9
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . That is no problem . I'll see you then .
segments.speaker: S2
